statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_data FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT segment_id, customer_id FROM customer_segments WHERE behavior_data ->> 'purchases' > '5';
SELECT customer_id, segment_id, behavior_data FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE behavior_data ->> 'last_purchase_date' BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, segment_id, behavior_data FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT behavior_data, customer_id, segment_id FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT segment_id, behavior_data, customer_id FROM customer_segments ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE behavior_data ->> 'purchase_date' = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, segment_id, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS_TEXT(behavior_data->'purchase_history') AS purchase_history FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY segment_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE segment = 'New';
SELECT behavior_event, event_timestamp, event_data FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT segment, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers GROUP BY segment;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE segment = 'A' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN customer_behavior ON customers.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id WHERE behavior_event = 'purchase' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, segment FROM customers GROUP BY segment HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(behavior_event) AS total_events FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_events DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE segment='VIP';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id=1001;
SELECT campaign_name, segment FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE segment='New Customers' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'Alice'
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND behavior_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT segment FROM customers
SELECT campaign_name, segment FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE segment IN ('VIP', 'Premium')
SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, click_timestamp FROM click_data ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, communication_channel, communication_date FROM communication_log WHERE communication_channel = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_total_amount DESC
SELECT c.customer_id, c.click_timestamp, p.total_amount FROM click_data c INNER JOIN purchase_history p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount > 1000
SELECT c.customer_id, c.communication_channel, c.communication_date FROM communication_log c WHERE c.communication_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, item_name, price FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, page_views, interactions FROM BehaviorData WHERE page_views > 100 AND interactions < 50;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM SegmentData WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Customer.name, PurchaseHistory.item_name, PurchaseHistory.price FROM Customer LEFT JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT Customer.name, SUM(BehaviorData.page_views) AS total_page_views FROM Customer INNER JOIN BehaviorData ON Customer.id = BehaviorData.customer_id GROUP BY Customer.name;

SELECT Customer.name, CommunicationLog.communication_type, CommunicationLog.status FROM Customer LEFT JOIN CommunicationLog ON Customer.id = CommunicationLog.customer_id WHERE CommunicationLog.sent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Customer.name, SegmentData.segment_name, SegmentData.segment_description FROM Customer INNER JOIN SegmentData ON Customer.segment = SegmentData.segment_name;
